website_summaries.verdict: While it has some nice features, it also has some quirks. And though it fits more cards than most competitors, filling the slots will likely make it too bulky for carrying in front pocket.
pros: Sports a classic, stylish folding design that holds cash and up to 8 cards
Has front pockets for frequently used cards
cons: Though men have been enthusiastic about this wallet's money clip, some find it flimsy and prone to breakage
Cards fit tightly and are difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Compact versatility
customer_reviews.text: Nice combination of versatility and consolidation. Can carry bills, cards and receipts in a compact case, without struggling to get cards out of the wallet in a pinch. Good for those who travel. Easy access to drivers license is a major plus. Picture has 6 cards, one corporate security card, drivers license, and 12 bills
customer_reviews.author: Simon Family

customer_reviews.title: Replaced Defective Wallet: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I like the ID on the outside of the wallet. I like the billfold. And I like the slim profile. However, I was worried about the pull tab design when I bought it but I figured I'd give it a try. It worked well at first but after six months the tab broke and now it's very difficult to get cards out of that part of the wallet. I posted a review and in a matter of a couple hours the company contacted me and sent me a replacement wallet. That's good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was what I was looking for 5 years ago when I bought my second Fossil front pocket wallet. I do love the Fossil ones, esp. the design but two times in a row, the clip broke. I would have bought this one in the stead of either of the two. The only draw back -- if it is one -- is that there is a limited amount of storage. I guess that is why they call it a Travel wallet. :) In any case, I love this wallet so far and am using it as my full time wallet. I am very pleased so far. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: William S. Blocksom

customer_reviews.title: I love the slim profile which is why I switched wallets ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have had this wallet for a week and it performs well and has replaced a much more expensive wallet that was similar. I love the slim profile which is why I switched wallets previously and don't see myself going back to a traditional wallet anytime soon. I purchased this for the RFID blocking capabilities as my other more expensive front pocket wallet did not offer it. The ID slot and the most used card slot have been very helpful and I would recommend this wallet to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: jason m

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly poor quality and design
customer_reviews.text: The leather is just plain weird and doesn't have a nice feel. The assembly is cheap and the functionality of the larger capacity pocket for multiple cards is inconsistent. I'm going to have to buy another wallet to replace this wallet which was to replace another one. Ugh . I can say the ID window is large and easy to access . I won't be using this product for even one day it missed the mark in both form and function.
customer_reviews.author: Kyran

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Update: They make it impossible to claim warranty on this wallet. They break in less than a year but you can't get a refund when there's no way to contact them. I'm tired of this wallet breaking and having to repurchase it. It looks nice, but is NOT worth the price. Original review: This has been one of my favorite wallets I've owned til this day! However recently the pull design on the wallet failed. Its the one thing that let this wallet down. Now I guess I'll have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: JinxxSpeaks

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome quality! I love the design with the ID window, quick access pocket, and pull-out tab. And it blocks RFID! I can fit more than 6-8 cards! Even packed with 13 cards, this thing still remains minimalist and compact compared to other slim wallets I have, such as Levi's, Dash, and Edwin. I really spent a lot of time looking at other similar wallets here in Amazon before choosing this one. Although it's a bit more expensive than the others, it is definitely worth the still low price compared to brand name wallets. This quality feels more premium. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ninjin_desu

customer_reviews.title: Good design... poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I do like the design and functions of the wallet. The 1 star is that I cant keep anything in it without being died brown. All the money and receipts. The cards all have a grainy coating. Tried taking some leather conditioner to it thinking it's just excess dye. But it just wasn't good. Stitching and all has been good. Just upset with what I paid for and got. Maybe the black would be better. I just cant use it much longer. It's very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: SamPen

customer_reviews.title: Love it ... Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this style wallet since back surgery in '89 as recommended by my surgeon. This style has gotten harder and harder to find. I love the quality of this wallet .. very well made. Quality through and through. My only regret ... and this is a personal preference ... I wish I had ordered the darker one. But hey ... maybe my style needs a change. Love it ... definitely a 5🌟 item.
customer_reviews.author: DaveW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a wallet or a leather expert. However, when I opened mine in the mail today, it looks and feels like good quality. The wallet is truly minimalist, albeit, maybe a tad too minimalist. If one of the card slots had slightly more space, it would be perfect. The color I got, the caramel, looks great and the cards fit snuggly into their slots. Once it’s broken in, it’ll be a little easier to pull them out. Haven’t tried the money clip portion just yet because I normally don’t carry cash. However, it’s nice to know when I do, it will be easy to access it without folding bills like other minimalist wallets I’ve bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: not a long lasting product.
customer_reviews.text: wallet was great for about 6 months then the clip quit working properly. It doesn’t properly clip the money in and it just flops around when I open my wallet spilling my cash. They fixed it by sending a new clip but now my cards won’t stay in the wallet. They keep slipping out. I really wanted to like this wallet and thought I would based on positive reviews but it’s not good.
customer_reviews.author: HOHFan

customer_reviews.title: The Changed my wallet life
customer_reviews.text: For years I struggled with leather wallet's always stretching out with use and being too bulky, cloth/nylon wallets that were "indestructible" and minimalist wallets for cards only.....nothing fit....they all had cons ...this wallet has NONE.... it's minimal so I fits comfortably in ANY pocket, holds all the cards I need, had a dedicated money holder that keeps my bills securely in place, AND a quick pull strap for my most frequently used cards....can not say enough about this other than I wish I hadn't wasted SO MUCH money ons wallets instead of buying this sooner....well done guys, home run! 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: DJ AK1 of J-Town Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Just got this wallet today. I am seriously satisfied with the design. It's simple but nice and compact yet able to store quite a bit. The leather feels genuine and has that nice "leather smell" to it. The money clip is sturdy and holds quite a bit of bills. The tab to pull your cards out with seems well built and functions smoothly. I will be enjoying this wallet for years to come! P.S. I will update my review after a few months of use. And I'm back months later! This baby is still going strong with absolutely no issues. No stretching issues of any kind either. I'll be using this for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet But the money clip broke in less then 3 months. They said you can tighten it but I tried and couldn’t do it. I would of rated this 5 star if that didn’t break. I would buy a new clip for it if it was available. Does anyone know how to get in touch with the seller so I can try to buy just a new money clip for the wallet
customer_reviews.author: CS1

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wallet and an amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a number of wallets in the past and they are either to large or not large enough to hold more than a couple cards. This wallet is the perfect size and has a great clip for the billfold. I love the quality of the construction and the leather is premium grade. I finally found the perfect wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kraynak

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, except for the poor quality of the strap pull everyday card feature.
customer_reviews.text: I truly liked this wallet, as a front pocket billfold. It was, by far, the best wallet I ever had until one of the best features—the everyday card pocket that pulled the cards out by pulling a strap—broke after a little less than 3 months use (See photograph). Although this doesn’t make the wallet unusable it does make the convenience of this feature useless.
customer_reviews.author: Defend_Liberty

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my old favorite wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have carried a front pocket wallet for some time. The last one I carried for over 15 years. It was like an old friend. I couldn't replace it with the same kind, as they quit making them. I was very apprehensive about finding the right replacement. I have had this one about 1 month and I love it. Actually I like it better than the one I had. It is very well made. Holds the 6 cards I carry easily. The money clip holds the money extremally secure and the tension can easily be adjusted, which is a nice feature. It's lighter and thinner than my old wallet. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I came across this wallet when I viewed a very expensive wallet on FB. So I searched for it here on Amazon. Serman Brands popped up, so the price was very reasonable and I purchased it. Very nice with really cool features. My last wallet I had to dig out my cards. With this one, I place my most frequently used card in the pull slot. Time will tell if it lasts. I went online and registered for the 12-month warranty. I am sure my inbox will get flooded. But a great looking and feature full wallet. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Efficient - Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As crazy as this sounds, this is the best wallet I've ever bought. I feel silly gushing about a wallet, but it is super efficient and very stylish. My daughter even commented on it. When's the last time someone complimented you on your wallet? I realized there were some things I could scan an put in my phone so I wouldn't have to carry them around with me, so I accomplished several goals. The credit card pocket is genius. I keep two in there. Mine comfortably holds 7 cards and a drivers license. You won't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky about daily-use items. Everybody's needs are different, but I couldn't find a suitable replacement for my old (circa 2003) Dockers front pocket wallet, as they changed the design. I definitely wanted the spring-lock money clip inside, ID display on the outside, and room for some cards. RFID blocking is a bonus. The money clip is just like the old-style Dockers. As it wears in, the card capacity will likely increase, but for now eight cards to carry is plenty, though I could squeeze in a couple more if necessary. Hopefully it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Lrxst

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wallet ever.
customer_reviews.text: I like wallets, I like minimal wallets, or at least thin so they don't have a lot of bulk in my pocket. This wallet met all my needs. A window for license, plenty of room for cards and cash. The metal clip they use is one I have on another wallet that is a very good one also. I really like the pull tab for popping up your favorite cards. I have 10 cards total in there and the wallet is the thinnest and most practical of any wallet I ever had. Using it for about a week now. Seems well built, I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: Cool Beans
customer_reviews.text: I love the slimness of this wallet. It's very cool and sleek And I have no issues pulling out my ID from the clear pocket unlike some wallets. Canyon Red is a good color to go with and stands out. I got my inspiration from a JOJO Bizarre adventure episode. The only thing I do have to say about this is the money clip. I wish the clip would be tighter as it's a bit loose with holding 8 slips of cash. The pockets are standard for Cards, however if it's not standard size, that card will peep out.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Wallet was delivered rapidly and was exactly as described. The wallet is made very well and should provide years of performance. I have had a front pocket wallet for several years that is now wearing out. This wallet is about the same size with similiar configuration. I expect it to perform as well if not better then the one it is replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet and glad I took the risk.
customer_reviews.text: I am a pseudo minimalist. I carry cash so I need places for the usual suspects. 5 C Cards, DL and about 5 membership cards. Everything fits snugly and very compact. I love this wallet and I have finally moved from my trusty old wallet. I absolutely love the pull cord for the packet that holds some random cards. If you like a small, neat and great looking wallet, this is the one for you. Oh and the carbon fiber one is sick looking!
customer_reviews.author: VeryOpinionated

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but much too small for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get a minimalist wallet but still wanted to carry most of what I already carry in my wallet. I liked the Serman Brands wallet because the material was of nice quality. However, it was way too small. I did not care for the money clip since anyone would be able to see my cash when I unfolded the wallet to grab a card. Additionally I tried to carry 15 bills and this made the wallet bulky and would not fold down. Combined, you would only be able to carry a total of 7 credit cards /pictures /membership cards, id's, etc. This and the cash issue convinced me that this was not the card for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend - not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my very picky BF 5 months ago and he LOVED it. However, now, all of the pockets have loosened (even though most had only one card in them) and his cards fall out unless he stacks multiple cards into one slot. I’m very surprised this happened just 5 months in. I don’t recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Well designed but number of cards this wallet can hold is more limited than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is nicely designed and I like having the clear plastic to display my license. This is really a plus. I bought this one because I previously purchased the "Andar Mens Leather Money Clip, Front Pocket Minimalist Card Holder RFID Blocking Wallet Made from Full Grain Leather, with Back Saving Bi-Fold Cash Clip" This does not have the display pocket but the two pockets hold more cards. the RF1D will not hold as many cards. The two sets of card pockets is a bit misleading because they oppose each other and limit the total number of cards that can be contained. So this is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: mark a. kay

customer_reviews.title: No More Losing My Cards!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little wallet that has converted me! I was able to go from a little portable wallet to the travel wallet that retains all my cards and ID. Last month I lost 1 credit card and my CPR card because the way the other travel wallets use flaps to retain your cards, this wallet actually has pocket that will not allow you to lose items.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gobble

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've always hated bulky wallets, but unfortunately I have around 13 cards which I have to always carry around with me. This wallet fits all 13 and it's still slim. The leather is beautiful, even more after it's been scratched around a bit. The RFID works great, my door card won't work if it's in the wallet or even halfway out. This means that your credit cards with RFID is protected. The build quality is very good and it feels like a premium wallet considering the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Rangga A

customer_reviews.title: I went with the cheapest option and I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a 1 star review and it vanished so let’s try 2 stars. Disappointed from the unboxing, suspected mine had been a returned product because I could see where a sticker had been placed over another sticker. Upon taking the product out of the bag my suspicions were confirmed, the face of the product was damaged. I ended up keeping it because the hassle of returning it wasn’t worth it to me. And because they would just try send this one to another person. Still using it, it’s a good product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Quality and presentation you wouldn’t expect from an Amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: This wallet comes packaged extremely nicely. It’s like something you’d bought from a small specialty shop. Presentation matters. The wallet is exactly what it’s supposed to be. A small and compact wallet that fits in your jacket pocket or front pockets. Yes you can still utilize it as a regular wallet and keep in your rear pocket. It does get thick once you put the allotted amount of cards and some bills in it. Absolutely a great purchase. I’ll be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice money clip wallet
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely, gift ready- wrapped very professionally, great quality. My husband loves the inside card sleeve with the pull tab that slides his cards right out and also the clear front to display his license without having take to take it out every time he needs to show it. The thumb size cut out on the opposite side is really nice for easy removal of his debit card. We are every happy with this purchase and have shared this product information for several friends!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Front Pocket Wallet? O yeah!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I tried it! I like the front pocket carry and I think the only thing a smaller wallet "downsized" was stuff I did not need to carry in the first place! It carries 6 cards (easily), my "emergency check" and whatever cash I have on any given day. I think it is a better representation of what we need than others wallets that represent what Dad and them needed. The ONLY reason that I did not give it 5 stars is that I have no idea how it will hold up as I have only purchased my recently!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Adams

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: The wallet fits comfortably in my front pocket while holding the essential things I need to carry. The metal clipthat holds cash protrudes to the outside of the wallet potentially offering a threat to scratch a phone screen if you carry one in the same pocket as I do but I have not had the issue so far. There is a ribbon mechanism to retrieve credit cards from a tight pocket that I hope will hold up for a while. If the product is durable, I will be very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: W of Florida

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have had this about a month or more and it works well for me. I've always been a front pocket carrying wallet person so I like the slim design with capability of holding ID, credit cards, and some cash. No comment yet on long term durability. Any wallet I've had in the past with the clear window didn't make it more than a year so that remains to be seen if this one can beat the record.
customer_reviews.author: N. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this wallet has held up great! I purchased it exactly 2 years ago, it is black in color. I hold approximately 17 cards in it including various small pieces of paper. I immediately pulled the money clip out as I didn’t want to utilize that feature. For $29 I wasn’t expecting a ton but needed a new wallet as my old one finally gave up. I am definitely impressed with it and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Weak spring on the money clip.
customer_reviews.text: The money clip spring didn’t last but a few weeks. If I’m not watching and making sure my wallet shut the money does have a tendency to slip out. I’m updating my review. I was sitting looking at my Wallet and I noticed the spring that holds the money actually Ken on twist a little bit or unscrew which makes it not as strong so I did a couple turns and the spring clip is back to brand new again. So with that being said I enjoy the wall it quite well holds everything nicely and sleek Lee and I’m gonna purchase another one for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Seems to be holding up really well. I'm a back pocket wallet guy, too much other stuff in the front pockets. Very slim and comfortable. Had to pair down some stuff though. Do I really need to carry those $5.00 Starbucks gift cards I've had for 4 years and never used or the Cabellas card that only had $1.89 left on it? Or the business card from some insurance dude I don't even remember? Nah, I don't. Cleared the crap and now only have the essentials and it doesn't look like I have a huge boil growing on my left butt cheek anymore. I would definitely recommend this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, thought I would get more life out of it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it Edit : (Less than one year later, about 11 months) So the outside pocket has started to rip, the sewing is coming undone and the pockets (for example : if I were to put 3 cards in one pocket, a week later if I move two of the cards, the pocket will stay the size of the 3 cards) so my cards were falling out all the time, the money holder still in tact and works really well and so do the inside pockets, as of now, I’m looking for a new wallet because the stitching is coming undone and my cards won’t stay now. Sad, I actually liked the wallet but probably won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McKee

customer_reviews.title: Lite on CC storage
customer_reviews.text: I only carry two credit cards but I also have medical coverage cards, library card, National Park Entrance Card, SS card, Costco / Sams Card, - just not enough storage for all so have to decide what to leave behind and hope I remember when I need them. Looks and Quality seem good and I am happy with that. Haven't carried a rear pocket wallet for years but the pocket wallet I had. had more storage and was not as thick as this. Try for a bit and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shows up in a great package, very quality leather, extremely practical and slim as well.  All around good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. If you're looking for something that's smaller than the typical wallet and yet more capable than a typical travel wallet - you've found it. I was a little skeptical on what the red pull cord was for, but that also works great and is something I use daily. As for packaging - really nice packaging. The small box from Sherman Brands is stylish and the wallet inside has an additional fabric bag around it, giving it more of an elegant feel when unpackaging. In short - a classy gift for someone looking to buy a wallet for their friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Techojappa

customer_reviews.title: A compact, useful wallet, small footprint.
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact wallet that holds all my cards, my money, and my driver's license. The one card I use the most,fits in a pocket all its own. The other cards fit in a pocket with a little strap you pull to expose the cards. One one side is a window for your driver's license or another card that needs to be available. A little clip on the inside holds the money. Overall, a beautiful compact wallet with a place for your cards and cash.
customer_reviews.author: Graig Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Compact, holds multiple cards, and bills
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. Having Drivers license and most used credit card on the outside is very convenient and makes it slimmer overall. The money clip inside holds a number of bills and my eyeglass cleaning cloth. It is very compact for the amount of stuff it carries. Seems to be good quality, but time will tell
customer_reviews.author: vt1991

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase same product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchase this wallet. I really like the layout. It holds a lot of cards/docs without becoming fat. Over time the leather stretches out a bit - hence purchased a new on. It appears they have improved the money clip - in my old wallet it became loose and didn't do a great job of holding bills in place. The new one is better. I travel a bunch and this wallet is easy to carry and easy to get to license and cards. I like it. Wish that the leather held up better and the money clip holds bills tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a couple of weeks so I don't know how well it will wear. It seems to be of good quality. I have had thinner wallets but they wore out after about a year. It has a small strap on one of the card slots that lifts the card out when you pull the strap which is a nice feature. It holds my cash, license, ATM card, health insurance card, and three credit cards. Attempting to add anything else makes it hard to slide things in and out. If it just held one or two more cards comfortably I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: got_cats

customer_reviews.title: Impressive so far
customer_reviews.text: On first use, this is a terrific bifold wallet! I have used up a Hartmann and a Tumi slim front pocket wallet and they lasted for over 5 years. The leather used with this seems solid and will soften with use but it will need to last as long for me to be a complete devotee but at its price point that may be wishful thinking so I may need to live with less. The test will be the thread used for the stitching which is usually the first thing to go. Nevertheless, I am gambling on its advertised excellence and have ordered three more for friends and family members.
customer_reviews.author: irish1101

customer_reviews.title: Protect your cards
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Well made and thoughtful design. I ride the train daily and used to tap my wallet on the metro pass sensor without having to remove my card from wallet. With this wallet, I have to remove the card or it won't be read. I keep the metro card in outside partially exposed pocket and still does not get detected. So credit slots are well hidden and should be well protected by comparison. The wallet is not much larger than credit cards so, easy to keep in front pant and vest coat pockets. Love the outer clear holder which I use for my ID, so no fishing around in the wallet. The cash clip works as anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: heriberto f. diaz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Wallet for Minimalist EDC
customer_reviews.text: Great Wallet and an excellent option for someone with a minimalist mindset such as myself. I use this wallet as my EDC and have no issues or regrets. I never carry an cash and limit my wallet capacity to 6 cards, an emergency $20, and 5 business cards. If you're like me - someone who can't imagine carrying 50 cards daily like some do, then this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Landry L.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. Bought it as I like the brand and it has an easy if access for my military ID. The pull tab for one of the credit card slot's is genius. Makes getting my three most used cards easy to access and put away. Not sure if you could fit more In that slot. Wallet is also designed for durability and is small. I will buy again once I wear this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Can hold more cards than you think, while still remaining small/flat.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful wallet. Can hold more cards than you think, while still remaining small/flat. Love the hidden card area and the fact that you can put cards on the outside to use without having to open the wallet up. Have to get use to having the money clip and having the bill hanging in the open every time the wallet is open....but i can see this being a plus for those who like others to think they have a lot of money.... For those who dont...put a $1 bill as your first and last bill, leave the hundreds in the center, and people will think you have just a few ones in there... I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Raymond G

customer_reviews.title: Money clip broke, but company shipped fast replacement!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company was quick to send out a replacement clip! The new clip feels sturdy, so I have high hopes. Changed to 5 star otherwise! Unfortunately, while I did enjoy the wallet's design, the money clip has proven completely useless after just one month, just outside of amazon's return policy. And that's honestly maybe using the wallet 8-10 times (as I haven't needed to go out much with quarantine). I attached a video where you can see that despite its maximum tightness, the clip's free play makes it totally impractical to try and carry cash with this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Why I Shop at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of my bulky wallet, and for security reasons decided to separate my credit cards from my IDs and money. I tried and returned two other leather wallets for settling on this one and couldn't be happier. Now I have two RFID wallets--this one and another that sandwiches my credit cards between sexy composite material. I feel much better organized.
customer_reviews.author: Monty J Heying

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is exactly what a I needed to get rid of the bulky trifold wallet I replaced it with. The packaging was very classy and definitely received the “wow” effect. The wallet is well made, looks awesome and does exactly what you will need it to do; get rid of the bulky feeling. 8-10 cards fit fine whether they’re credit cards or picture ID’s such as a driver’s license. At first, removing cards is a little tight, but after a few days it will stretch. Do not hesitate to purchase this wallet. You will not be disappointed. I liked the black one so much, I purchased the red one a week later and man it looks just as nice!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice wallet for individuals who don't need everything and the kitchen sink!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for my old Wallet. It is smaller not able to hold as many cards but to be honest I realized I didn't need the other cards I was carrying. It has plenty of pockets and even one that seems hidden. Once you found all the spots you can work with it. It does have a genuine leather smell. I will say it does get scratches a little easy as I have a few with everyday use of it but believe it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Very ergonomic.. very slim.. Very good..
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wallet so far. It’s not my first slim wallet, but it’s designed better than the one with magnets as magnets often add some weight and thickness to the wallet. I am glad that this wallet has not magnets and yet it stays closed when it’s closed, it’s designed that well. If you are looking for a slim wallet, you can’t go wrong with this particular wallet. I like the money clip as it holds money and also some receipts in place. All in all I would highly recommend this wallet to friends and family and I will definitely buy it agin if I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Keyur

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made real wallet with uncommon features . I enjoy having a gold money clip holding my cash, while to see-thru ID pocket allows me to flash my NYPD PBA card badge without having to open the wallet. RFID shielding is built in as well. You can also carry 6-8 credit cards I have owned this wallet for 7 months now and it is aging like real leather. It's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Art Master T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Love the oversized ID window, excellent access to the 2 inside card slots, and the outside quick-access slot for that one card that gets used all the time is definitely handy. Remains to be seen if the "hidden" tab to pull up the rest of the cards holds up, but so far so good; the money clip...seems adequate (don't have a lot to compare to - the directions to maintain spring tautness is a nice touch). Wouldn't try and jam/carry more than 8 cards, though, as it starts to "round" the overall wallet. I'd buy it again...hopefully not for some time though!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and small, as advertised. Good quality leather.
customer_reviews.text: My initial impression is very good. The leather appears very high quality. Stitching is solid with no discernable breaks or loose threads. The money clip appears to be high quality. The pull tab for the hidden card is extremely handy. Easily my favorite feature. I find myself playing with it. I guess we'll find out long term durability this way. It might be viable to consider expanding the concept. Maybe a pull tab on the other side of the wallet. I will revise my review as time goes on. I'll be paying especially close attention to the stitches. I fully expect this to be a wallet that'll last at least 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Springman

customer_reviews.title: Love how thin and small it is.  High quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Serman Wallet in Texas Brown. After using it for a few days, I noticed a lighter colored scratches where my credit card hits before sliding into the side pocket. I contacted the Seller who suggested applying skin oil and rubbing in a circular motion. I found this to work great if I use the oil from my nose. The lighter scratches disappear and the leather takes on a deeper brown color. I am pleased with the wallet quality, price and the Seller who offered me an exchange for another leather or a refund.
customer_reviews.author: brian s.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and nicely thought out.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is very well thought out. Bills are neatly organized and accessible. Frequently used items are easy to get to with plenty of storage for additional cards. I really like this wallet and am pleased with my selection.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Parsons

customer_reviews.title: I now have an organized wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet arrived on time, it came enclosed in a bag and in a small box then the shipping container. I say all that to demonstrate that this company cares about the product they sell. The wallet is very well made, no loose strings or anything like that. As for features, the ID and "debit" card compartments are awesome. I love the size of the wallet, I got rid of all the unnecessary cards and bits of folded paper I forgot I had in my old wallet as they would not fit. I now carry a wallet with only what I need and using it is a blast. I highly recommend this company and this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Philip R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The unboxing of this wallet was amazing. You open the amazon packaging to get this really nice box. Open the box to have a protective sleeve and inside the sleeve was another wrapping. The wallet is impeccable. It stores all of my cards, and there is so much space. They make this so easy to use, even coming with a little card with instructions for the money clip and the pull tab.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Money clip tends to loosen....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet in July, 1918. and liked it....generally well made, slim, and reasonably priced. But by summer, 2019, the money clip loosened. I lost it completely in Oct., 2019, and now use a rubber band to hold my in my bills. Would it not make sense for the money clip be affixed so, as the wallet ages, the clip does not fall out...? A small metal eye on the clip sewn into the wallet would prevent such.....
customer_reviews.author: rhl60

customer_reviews.title: Best Wallet Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Serman Brands Wallet in a 2 year span. This is the perfect wallet, and I have found one to last me around a year to year and a half depending on how hard I am on it and can easily justify dropping $30 on a quality item as such. (Forget to register for warranty or it’d be free) I’ve had the California Dessert for the past two wallets but wanted something darker and the chocolate is perfect. Looking forward to another great wallet.
customer_reviews.author: NurseRyan

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet a lot. I’ve had it for a couple month and the leather is wearing in nicely. It has helped me to pair down to what I actually need in my wallet. But the issue I’ve had with the wallet is the money clip portion. It continually pulls out of the wallet. If it wasn’t for this I would give it 5 stars and this may just be a defect of mine but it is something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: TBurk

customer_reviews.title: What’s good for the goose is good for the gander
customer_reviews.text: Even though the target audience for this wallet is men, I am most definitely a woman. I got tired of schlepping around a thick, bulky and heavy wallet in my purse.! So I bought this incredibly slim mens’ wallet. It is the perfect size and holds everything that I need on a daily basis and then some. If you are tired of being dictated to about what is a fashionable according to your gender, then this wallet is a definite keeper. I am 100% pleased with the look and compact functionality of this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Waitman

customer_reviews.title: A great modern front pocket wallet that doesn't take up much room!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet! It's compact, stylish, and super efficient in its use of space. I can fit up to 8 cards in this in addition to whatever cash I need to carry around. I also LOVE the two easily accessible outside pockets - one for your license or ID, and the other to hold your most used card.There's also a removable money clip that easily slides out to make this even thinner for the times when you don't need to have cash in pocket. A really great option for those who like a wallet but not the bulk and fuss of the more traditional thicker wallets of the past.
customer_reviews.author: M. Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome wallet! Better than the 1.0 as the tab isn't exposed to get caught. I keep 11 cards in this wallet without problem. Sure a couple are thin, insurance type cards, but this has no issues. Having the ID window on the outside is more accessible that inside. Yes, it's a bit small if you need to keep foreign currency, but you can always fold them.
customer_reviews.author: REV

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality and really innovative features.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet's size is really small even after adding cash plus 6 cards. On the outside there is space for an id card (plastic window) and for your most used card, which can be retracted easily without opening the wallet. On the inside there are pockets for two cards, plus a hidden pocket where you can add additional credit cards. These you can reveal by pulling the cord. All cards are protected from RFID readers. The only thing you should keep in mind is that the wallet is narrow. Dollars fit nicely but Εuro notes over €20 will protrude. The wallet comes in a box and cloth bag. It also includes some cards with instructions and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Ayan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality slim wallet
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a slim wallet...this is not quite as slim as I wanted but it is satisfactory. The card pull tab works really well, the leather seems good quality. I store 7 credit card sized cards. You could probably store 9 cards at most. Haven't used the cash clip yet, but it is spring weighted and seems that it would snap onto notes just fine. Don't even bother trying to store coins, who carries coins any more these days anyway? I just throw them in the car and the kids snap them up.
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet may look small but looks can be deceiving. I was able to fit 8 credit cards including my drivers license and thr money clip keeps your money secure. It feels well made and should last long. My only gripe was it came with a slight imperfection on the front card slot and it drives my OCD crazy. Great wallet overall.
customer_reviews.author: Hanz_Dolo13

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward choice for your next wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best wallet I’ve ever owned, and not to mention one of the cheapest. It doesn’t fit all of my cards, but I would sacrifice space for quality. The leather seems durable and smooth while still having that rugged feel. Front card slot is also super useful. The only problem I have to nitpick is that the ID window blocks my birthyear if I place it upright (with regards to the Serman logo in front). It obviously works fine if I flip it upside down, but I think it looks a little silly. All in all, you can’t go wrong with buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Lore

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Shipped quickly and was received in perfect condition with excellent packaging. The only comment is that the dollar holder is hinged, which doesn't hold the bills tightly. None have fallen out, but can't see any reason to have a hinge on something this thin. A tension holder seems a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great quality, light weight and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, compact wallet with RFID protection for your cards. This reduced the size of my old wallet in half! I chose the black one which has a cool "black carbon fiber" like look to it. The money clip in the center is adjustable for better grip. The other great thing is the hidden card pocket i keep my debit card in there that has a pull tab that slides the card out. 5 stars for quality, usefulness and design.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bruce

customer_reviews.title: 5-Star Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Customer Sevice is worth 5-stars itself! I had a shipment issue (if my own making) and the company went above and beyond to fix it for me. The wallet is nice. Leather is sturdy, but the wallet overall is still compact and thin. I use it for my work ID. If you need something just for IDs and a couple of credit cards, this is perfect. If you need to carry cash and use your wallet to keep store receipts, etc., I’d suggest another option.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet looking for a front pocket wallet with a money clip. I had a metal front pocket wallet but it didn’t hold things securely. This wallet is everything I wanted in a wallet. It holds my credit cards securely and any cash I have is safely tucked away in the money clip. And my ID and license are also securely in their window pouch. If you’re looking for a good wallet at a great price, this one is it.
customer_reviews.author: NSHarter

customer_reviews.title: What a really great wallet this turned out to be.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my youngest son, who has the tendency to be very picky. Once he received this wallet, he grabbed it and opened and closed the billfold. He proceeded to take everything out of his old wallet and put it in to the new wallet! Then closed it a could not believe how much thinner the new wallet was. He loves it and now his older brother wants one. Mmwo
customer_reviews.author: Jenae Gagne

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a good wallet
customer_reviews.text: I love this wallet. I have had the same wallet since 2006 and have been unable to find one that I liked as much, until NOW! I bought the olive green one and it has the money clip inside. It holds 11 cards and my license and I plan on keeping it for another 10 or so years.
customer_reviews.author: MrBigTCat

customer_reviews.title: Got back problems?  Looking for your last wallet?
customer_reviews.text: I have been through many wallets, especially since having back problems. I have finally found a wallet that not only meets my needs with the practical layout & design, but also has the exceptional quality of workmanship. Spend a little more and get the right one that will hold up. I was surprised at the gift quality packaging. If you are looking for a gift for someone, especially if they have back problems, you won't go wrong buying this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pendrey

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My impression of the wallet out if the box is one of quality. I like not sitting on my wallet anymore, as I carry this in my front pocket. The ID window and space for cards is sufficient for the important stuff. I just need to figure out a new EDC notes solution. My old wallet was a Levenger International Briefcase, which has room for 3x5 cards.
customer_reviews.author: T. W. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thin and better than a wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thin. Still loaded it up like my regular wallet was and this one took all the cards that I use. Easier to use than a standard wallet with the easy access slot on the outside and the pull up tab to pull your cards up on the inside. Quality looks good and only time will tell how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They're well-made
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wallet from this manufacturer. I love them. They're well-made, and have very convenient features. Buy one. Gift one. Seriously. UPDATE: The second wallet I bought was the Canyon Red version (the first was a normal brown leather). The Canyon Red is beautiful, but it will rub off onto the insides of your pockets, onto receipts and any other paper you keep in your wallet. I'd buy this wallet again no doubt, but I would certainly weigh another color due to the color transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Rice

customer_reviews.title: A good small wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small wallet that I could put in my front pocket. This meets my needs well. Only down side with any small wallet is what you can carry. So I won't hold this against this wallet. I can carry my license, a fee credit cards and a couple of business cards. After using this for 2 months, this wallet is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: droid fan

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I am still interviewing this wallet, which now lives in my front pocket, to see how it accommodates to my EDC. It is a bit larger than what I am accustomed to, but that is only due to the inclusion of cash into the money clip. I formerly carried my cash in a different pocket in a separate clip, so overall I no longer need to carry the separate clip. We shall see how it works in the long run
customer_reviews.author: roy a dudley

customer_reviews.title: Clever design, seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box this seems very well made so I hope I get a good number of years out it. The design is clever and just right if you prefer to carry only 5-6 cards, license, and a minimum number of bills. As another buyer said, I might buy another one now to ensure I have a replacement when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!!
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet I’ve ever had! My previous one had a money clip on one side but it was hard to get the cash in and out. I had specific requirements for a new one including a clear ID pocket. Good quality and sufficient space. Could be challenging if you carry a lot of cards. My only complaint would be that it can be difficult for me to get my drivers license out by pushing through the hole in the plastic cover but that seems to be mainly because I have too much stuff underneath my license. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Siclair

customer_reviews.title: Well made slim wallet with real capacity -- money clip and room for 5-6 cards and ID!
customer_reviews.text: Just had it a week but if it holds up, it will be my favorite 'small' wallet! Seems well made, adjustable tension money clip and ID window. I like the pull out CC slots --hope that ribbon holds up with use. Fits back or front pocket use. You'll know it is there (which makes me feel better, hate when I 'sense' that my wallet pocket is empty!) but won't be a problem sitting on it or wearing in the front. Probably a little big for shirt pocket use, but I don't do that!
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Nice little wallet
customer_reviews.text: Always a little freaky replacing a wallet that you have carried for years, You get used to things. So took a chance with this one and have been very pleased. Seems to be very well made and the lay out is proving to be handy. After switching to a front pocket style wallet several years ago, I can't imagine having to carry one in my back pocket again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant to buy a wallet off of Amazon; can't really gauge construction quality with a few pictures! But I was pleasantly surprised! The wallet looks great and seems to be made very well. The pull-out tab isn't flimsy and the money clip is strong enough to hold a sizable stack of bills without any issues. There's even a smooth lining on some of the pockets. It makes sliding the cards out a bit easier, which is great for a slim wallet like this. I'm very happy with it! It's quite slim, so don't expect to hold a ton of cards. But for the essentials, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bunso

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect wallet for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am very very pleased with this little wallet! The ribbon is a very clever way to store my less used cards while staying accessible, the two quick access slots are perfect for my most used cards, the money clip is sturdy and tightly gripping and the ID slot snuggly holds my ID without it being too difficult to access. I'm in love with this wallet and if/when this one wears out (which feels like it will be a while, it is really nice material and good production quality), I'll likely just get another of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tsuki

customer_reviews.title: Really thin
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back challenges so my doctor suggested that I abandon carrying a wallet in my back pocket. Also, I'm headed to Europe for a few weeks so I wanted something thin that didn't telegraph where my wallet was stored. I've started using this wallet and it is thin and has very limited carrying capacity so you have to limit your cards to 3 or 4 max. Overall, it will take some getting used to but does fill the bill for being thin.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Like a file cabinet stuffed into one lil package!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Literally took a wallet 3 times larger,to hold the same amount of stuff this little beast holds. All kinds of secret hiding places to put cards,license,etc,plus,a hidden pull out tab to safeguard your most important ones.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: This wallet is very slim and hand crafted with great quality. Exactly as shown and just what I was looking for. After my initial review, the seller sent me a new wallet. Excellent customer service. Would buy from again! Just received this wallet today. It looks and feels great. However, after removing the packaging, I noticed that there are scuff marks on the side for the most used card.
customer_reviews.author: AMcDonald

customer_reviews.title: YOU MIGHT LOSE YOUR CARDS 😬
customer_reviews.text: I have used this wallet for a while now and it’s a great wallet, however it’s not built to last long. The cards no longer stay in my wallet. I have the same amount of cards in my wallet and the wallet stretches out and the cards fall out. This is not very secure for day to day activity. I find myself constantly checking to make sure all of my cards are still there. It’s the perfect size but it’s not meant for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D.

customer_reviews.title: Lean and Mean.
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. I tended to carry too much in my wallet. This one had me reconsider what I truly need to have with me when I leave my house. Even though I still may carry a few cards too many my wallet is so thin I have to double check to see if I’m still carrying it with me. That is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like it more than I expected to.It holds all the cards and cash I need without the bulk. Appears to be good quality for the price. The only con is that the pull tab gets stuck on the edge of the cards on the opposite side sometimes.when that happens it starts pulling out the card when you open it. I solved that with a small piece of tape on the edge of the pull tab. You cant see it until you pull it out. Its still pretty new to me so time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had this wallet 3 months and was disappointed that the money clip broke off and was lost. I looked for a new wallet, but really like the thumb hold feature in this one. I noticed the warranty, contacted the company, and they sent a new money clip part! Great customer service, and I get to continue to use the wallet I really like.
customer_reviews.author: lccasnelson

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY THIS piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Literally fell part when I was trying to open the wallet and place my stuff inside. There is an intrusive "money clip" inside the wallet and another confusing strap which seems to serve no purpose at all other than dangling outside the fold. I wish I could give negative stars for this overpriced complete and utter piece of garbage. This might very well be the absolute worst product I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice slim wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice slim wallet. Personally I think there is plenty of room for cash, I think you can easily put in 20 + bills. My only complaint is the bills are only held by a folding lever, I would prefer them covered so when i open the wallet it's not free for all to see my bills. Also, you need to be careful they don't fall out when you release the lever (you can pull bills out without releasing but when you put bills back when obtaining change you need to release IMO). Overall I'm happy but may continue to look for something with the traditional bill holding pocket.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT FORREST THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Clean and Slimfit Wallet
customer_reviews.text: My old bifold was stolen and I needed a replacement and I am so glad that I changed my style up. This wallet is sleek, sturdy, looks great and really encourages you to keep a tidy wallet. The money clip inside is great too and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K S

product_meta.title: SERMAN BRANDS RFID Blocking Slim Bifold Genuine Leather Minimalist Front Pocket Wallets for Men with Money Clip
feature_bullets: PATENT PENDING - 12 MONTH WARRANTY, The SERMAN BRANDS Warranty covers any factory defects as a result from the manufacturing process of the product.

SAFETY. PRIVACY. SECURITY - Our wallets are equipped with advanced RFID SECURE Technology, a unique metal composite, engineered specifically to block 13.56 MHz or higher RFID signals and protect the valuable information stored on RFID chips from unauthorized scans.

SLIM AND STYLISH - Made with the Finest Full Grain genuine leather, Designed Quick Access ID Windows, Best Fits 6-8 cards plus US bills with no bulk, and a minimal Pull-tab design to reduce bulk - Wallet Size: 3.9" in. x 2.8" in. .5" in.

HOW IT WORKS- At last! A wallet that will meet your everyday needs. The SERMAN BRANDS wallet is equipped with a front pocket made for your most used card. 2 pockets on the inside, with a photo ID slot, and a money clip to hold your cash. Wallet case also has smart pull-strap for quick access to your everyday cards.

LEATHERS- We use only the finest leathers to make smart and stylish wallets! Premium full grain leathers that are soft and appealing! Our vintage leathers stay true to their nature by being receptive to scratches. With use the wallet will absorb the natural oils of your hands which will allow the wallet to develop a rich and dark color. Over time, your wallet will develop a character that matches your adventures.
